articles.title: Moderna to supply up to 125 million COVID-19 vaccine doses globally in first quarter - Reuters

articles.title: Southwest Airlines notifies nearly 7000 employees that they may be furloughed - Fox Business
articles.description: Southwest Airlines, which has never laid off a worker in its 49-year history, notified 6,828 employees that they may be involuntarily furloughed next year as the airline industry continues to suffer amid the coronavirus pandemic.
